text: @HHSGov @WhiteHouse @SecAzar @POTUS You sure changed your tune.  When you tried repeatedly to see trump about Covid-19  he didn’t want to hear it!  Now all of a sudden there’s this wonderful Warp Speed plan trump has concocted.  He didn’t do anything in the beginning and now he has a plan.  Don’t believe it!
